author: CTPPS
body:
This PR introduce the track fitting procedure for the CTPPS diamond detector.
* new data format (`CTPPSDiamondLocalTrack`) to store the spatial and temporal track information
* new `EDProducer` with an associated track fitting algorithm (fit procedure: see slide 3 [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/589581/contributions/2377694/)) using the `CTPPSDiamondRecHit` collection introduced in #17317/#17535 as an input

Built on top of #17535 (diff: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/compare/8083280809638dff8dbde5faf4f1ec63bade0f6f...CTPPS:ctpps_diamond_ltreco)
title: CTPPS: Diamonds track reconstruction
